settings.section_title: What our customers say about us

settings.specialisation_description:
Shipping: Once an order has been dispatched fromwarehouse, customers will receive an order confirmation email with the relevant tracking number to check the shipment status of their order. Please kindly check the spam inbox, in case the order confirmation email is located there

Delivery: Our warehouse will process orders starting from the next business day after the order is submitted Please allow 5 business days for delivery. Please note that our delivery time frames are only estimates, and may vary in the event of external factors

settings.title: AVENTURINE DIAL
settings.description: The Aventurine Stone Dial, crafted from a real mineral, is a nod to the cosmic inspiration that has become synonymous with Paul Rich timepieces. It's not just a dial; it's a piece of the universe captured in time. This connection to celestial themes is a seamless evolution from the earlier Star Dust Collection, creating a thematic continuity that underscores Paul Rich's narrative.
